pages.text: $(li)The Obsidian Chest is a upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:utility/iron_chest/diamond_chest)Diamond Chest$(/l).$(br)$(li)They have the same capacity of the Diamond Chests, 108 slots, but Obisidan Chests are completely Blast Resistant.
$(li)A Diamond Chest can be upgraded to a Obsidian Chest.$(br)$(li)Just right click it while you have one Diamond to Obsidian Chest Upgrade on your hand.
pages.title: Obsidian Chest Upgrade
